      • getInitialEnergyCost

        public static int getInitialEnergyCost()
        Gets the one-time energy cost to initiate this command.
        Returns:
        the amount of energy consumed by initiating this command

      • getOngoingEnergyCost

        public static int getOngoingEnergyCost()
        Gets the energy cost per second of this command.
        Returns:
        the amount of energy consumed per second while this command is executing

      • isBlocking

        public static boolean isBlocking()
        Returns true if the Command will stop other commands from processing. (default true)
        Returns:
        true if the command blocks (default).
        Since:
        1.1

      • executesImmediately

        public static boolean executesImmediately()
        Returns true if the Command executes as soon as it is processed in the queue and does not delay for any period of time. (default false) All commands which execute immediately are blocking commands; however, since they don't delay, there is not much impact to consider besides energy costs.
        Returns:
        false by default
        Since:
        1.1
